text: The was Japanese political party, formed by then-present and former regional government leaders. It was officially headed by Hiroshi Yamada; Hiroshi Nakada was secretary-general and former governor of Yamagata Hiroshi Saito led the party's policy committee. New 'Japan Innovation Party' announced, aiming for seats in summer election == References == ==External links== Category:Anti- communist organizations in Japan Category:Conservative parties in Japan Category:Defunct political parties in Japan Category:Political parties established in 2010 Category:Political parties disestablished in 2012 Category:2010 establishments in Japan Category:2012 disestablishments in Japan
title: Spirit of Japan Party
